channel.title: Karma bug!
channel.description:
My rep must be 5... but its 0 >> look:
Karma Change Log Who Whom Amount For What Where When Jussel (+0/-0) jensie (+0/-0) 1 gre In topic December 12, 2006, 09:53:08 AM Jussel (+0/-0) Reccey (+0/-0) 1 qgew In topic December 12, 2006, 09:53:02 AM Jussel (+0/-0) jensie (+0/-0) 1 My m8!! In topic December 12, 2006, 04:17:27 AM Jussel (+0/-0) Reccey (+0/-0) 1 leuk man :) In topic December 11, 2006, 02:41:20 PM Jussel (+0/-0) jensie (+0/-0) 1 You helped me! :D In topic December 11, 2006, 02:39:31 PM (Values: 5)
So why?? [glow=red,2,300]Jussel[/glow]

Wow i like i can acces the moparscape cm forum lol
Moparisthebest reset all the reps against the abusing

item.title: Karma bug!
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

Jussel im about to make a topic refering to this matter…

The reputation has been changed for the better,

You can not rep until you have 15 reputation… THis is to stop the abusing of this feature…

Karma is suppose to be used only when the proper time is… In addition, now you cant speed your way to 50 karma to get community member…

This adjustment might have taken away most of the peoples karma, but it teaches a lession not to abuse a privelage or it will be taken away…

Read full topic
